profile_positions.description:
Analysis and Development within Salesforce Platform:
Trigger development, Visualforce Pages, Aura and Lightning Web Components, Automation non-code tools (Flows, Process Builders, Workflow Rules), Salesforce CMS, Salesforce Communities (Digital Experiences), Administration tools (Permission Sets, Profiles, Approval Processes)
profile_positions.title: Salesforce Developer

company.name: Unosquare
company.description:
Unosquare provides custom software development with agile software delivery professionals for Healthcare, Financial Services, and High Tech customers. We do this work from the USA, Latin America, and the United Kingdom. 

With over 2,500 successfully completed projects, nearly 600 full-time employees, and 100 active distributed teams, Unosquare has been one of the fastest growing private businesses in the USA with Inc. 5000 rankings for the last 6 years (2014 - 2020).
